text.name: Camera Obscura
text.description:
{Camera Obscura}

The Camera Obscura allows it to cast {Age} on enemy units.
text.event: You stumble upon a bizarre and mortifying scenery: A bunch of dried up corpses donning fashionable outfits, posed up as in for a family portrait. The painter is nowhere to be seen, and instead of canvas there is a small wooden box with a lens on the easel. You decide to take the device and leave quickly, feeling stares of the dead upon you.
